Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{wp|lang=ja|コウノトリ}} {{wp|lang=ja|コウノトリ科}} {{wp|lang=ja|コウノトリ目}} {{wp|Oriental stork}} [[file:Bocian czarnodzioby Ciconia boyciana RB7.jpg|thumb|right|250px|{{m|ja||鸛|tr=kōnotori}}: an Oriental stork]]
{{ja-kanjitab|こうのとり|yomi=k}} Compound of {{com|ja|sort=こうのとり|鸛|tr1=kō|t1={{vern|Oriental stork}}|pos1=see below|の|tr2=no|pos2=attributive particle|鳥|tr3=tori|t3=[[bird]]}}.
